unnormalised: Brig. Sharma confirmed the successful completion of Operation Vijay earlier today. The operation, aimed at securing the border region, concluded at 1400 hrs IST without any major incidents.
normalised: Brigadier Sharma confirmed the successful completion of Operation Vijay earlier today. The operation, aimed at securing the border region, concluded at fourteen hundred hours I-S-T without any major incidents.

unnormalised: According to reports, Col. Reddy and his team played a crucial role in strategizing and executing the mission. The Defence Ministry has lauded their efforts and announced commendations for all involved, including Subedar Major Khan who displayed exemplary courage.
normalised: According to reports, Colonel Reddy and his team played a crucial role in strategizing and executing the mission. The Defence Ministry has lauded their efforts and announced commendations for all involved, including Subedar Major Khan who displayed exemplary courage.

unnormalised: Adm. Verma released a statement praising the inter-service coordination, highlighting the seamless integration between the Army, Navy, and Air Force. He emphasized the importance of maintaining vigilance in the region.
normalised: Admiral Verma released a statement praising the inter-service coordination, highlighting the seamless integration between the Army, Navy, and Air Force. He emphasized the importance of maintaining vigilance in the region.

unnormalised: The Ministry has scheduled a press conference for 16/08/2024, where more details about Operation Vijay will be disclosed by Lt. Gen. Singh and other senior officers. They're also expected to address questions regarding future strategies and deployment plans.
normalised: The Ministry has scheduled a press conference for sixteenth August two thousand and twenty four, where more details about Operation Vijay will be disclosed by Lieutenant General Singh and other senior officers. They are also expected to address questions regarding future strategies and deployment plans.
